instructions.name: authorize
docs: Authorize the Auctioneer to manage an Auction House.

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: auctionHouse
docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: auctioneerAuthority
docs: The auctioneer program PDA running this auction.

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw `amount` from the escrow payment account for your specific wallet.

accounts.name: auctionHouseProgram
docs: Auction House Program

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: receiptAccount
docs: SPL token account or native SOL account to transfer funds to. If the account is a native SOL account, this is the same as the wallet address.

accounts.name: escrowPaymentAccount
docs: Buyer escrow payment account PDA.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Auction House instance treasury mint account.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Auction House instance authority account.

accounts.name: auctionHouse
docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: auctionHouseFeeAccount
docs: Auction House instance fee account.

accounts.name: auctioneerAuthority
docs: The auctioneer program PDA running this auction.

accounts.name: ahAuctioneerPda
docs: The auctioneer PDA owned by Auction House storing scopes.

instructions.name: deposit
docs: Deposit `amount` into the escrow payment account for your specific wallet.

accounts.name: auctionHouseProgram
docs: Auction House Program

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: paymentAccount
docs: User SOL or SPL account to transfer funds from.

accounts.name: transferAuthority
docs: SPL token account transfer authority.

accounts.name: escrowPaymentAccount
docs: Buyer escrow payment account PDA.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Auction House instance treasury mint account.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Auction House instance authority account.

accounts.name: ahAuctioneerPda
docs: The auctioneer PDA owned by Auction House storing scopes.

instructions.name: cancel
docs: Cancel a bid or ask by revoking the token delegate, transferring all lamports from the trade state account to the fee payer, and setting the trade state account data to zero so it can be garbage collected.

accounts.name: auctionHouseProgram
docs: Auction House Program

accounts.name: listingConfig
docs: The Listing Config used for listing settings

accounts.name: seller
docs: The seller of the NFT

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: tokenAccount
docs: SPL token account containing the token of the sale to be canceled.

accounts.name: tokenMint
docs: Token mint account of SPL token.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Auction House instance authority account.

accounts.name: auctionHouse
docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: auctionHouseFeeAccount
docs: Auction House instance fee account.

accounts.name: tradeState
docs: Trade state PDA account representing the bid or ask to be canceled.

accounts.name: auctioneerAuthority
docs: The auctioneer program PDA running this auction.

accounts.name: ahAuctioneerPda
docs: The auctioneer PDA owned by Auction House storing scopes.

instructions.name: executeSale
docs: Execute sale between provided buyer and seller trade state accounts transferring funds to seller wallet and token to buyer wallet.

accounts.name: auctionHouseProgram
docs: Auction House Program

accounts.name: listingConfig
docs: The Listing Config used for listing settings

accounts.name: buyer
docs: Buyer user wallet account.

accounts.name: seller
docs: Seller user wallet account.

accounts.name: tokenAccount
docs: Token account where the SPL token is stored.

accounts.name: tokenMint
docs: Token mint account for the SPL token.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: Metaplex metadata account decorating SPL mint account.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Auction House treasury mint account.

accounts.name: escrowPaymentAccount
docs: Buyer escrow payment account.

accounts.name: sellerPaymentReceiptAccount
docs: Seller SOL or SPL account to receive payment at.

accounts.name: buyerReceiptTokenAccount
docs: Buyer SPL token account to receive purchased item at.

docs: Auction House instance authority.

docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: auctionHouseFeeAccount
docs: Auction House instance fee account.

accounts.name: auctionHouseTreasury
docs: Auction House instance treasury account.

accounts.name: buyerTradeState
docs: Buyer trade state PDA account encoding the buy order.

accounts.name: sellerTradeState
docs: Seller trade state PDA account encoding the sell order.

accounts.name: freeTradeState
docs: Free seller trade state PDA account encoding a free sell order.

accounts.name: auctioneerAuthority
docs: The auctioneer program PDA running this auction.

accounts.name: ahAuctioneerPda
docs: The auctioneer PDA owned by Auction House storing scopes.

instructions.name: sell
docs: Create a sell bid by creating a `seller_trade_state` account and approving the program as the token delegate.

instructions.name: buy
docs: Create a private buy bid by creating a `buyer_trade_state` account and an `escrow_payment` account and funding the escrow with the necessary SOL or SPL token amount.

errors.name: BumpSeedNotInHashMap
errors.msg: Bump seed not in hash map

errors.name: BidTooLow
errors.msg: The bid was lower than the highest bid

errors.name: SignerNotAuth
errors.msg: The signer must be the Auction House authority

errors.name: NotHighestBidder
errors.msg: Execute Sale must be run on the highest bidder

errors.name: BelowReservePrice
errors.msg: The bid price must be greater than the reserve price

errors.name: BelowBidIncrement
errors.msg: The bid must match the highest bid plus the minimum bid increment

errors.name: CannotCancelHighestBid
errors.msg: The highest bidder is not allowed to cancel
